dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI Odometry dataset is used to evaluate the robustness and accuracy of the proposed SLAM system, providing data collected from visual and LiDAR sensors.
dcterms:title: KITTI Odometry

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhu
C. Zheng
C. Yuan
X. Huang
X. Hong
dcterms:description: The S3E dataset is utilized to assess the performance of the proposed SLAM system, particularly in challenging scenarios with vertical sparsity of reprojected LiDAR points.
dcterms:title: S3E
